entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit support. How may I assist you today?
I need to return something. I'm not happy with it at all.
I understand. I'm happy to help you with your return. Can you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with your purchase?
It's [customer's email address]. I'm trying to return a VeloBand Pulse I bought a couple of weeks ago. It's just not working out for me.
Thank you. I've located your order. I see you purchased the VeloBand Pulse on [date of purchase, 15 days ago]. To confirm, you'd like to initiate a return?
Yes! That's exactly what I want. This VeloBand Pulse is useless to me. How do I get my money back? This whole process is taking too long already.
I apologize for any inconvenience. Let me quickly review our return policy for the VeloBand Pulse. One moment please.

Okay, I've reviewed your purchase. According to our return policy, you have up to 90 days to return items for a full refund. Since you're well within that timeframe, we can definitely process your return.
90 days? Seriously? I thought it was less. Well, that's good news. So, what do I need to do?

To start, I will send you a prepaid shipping label to your email address on file. Simply repackage the VeloBand Pulse in its original packaging, if possible, affix the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location. Once we receive the returned smart watch, we will process your refund, which should reflect in your account within 7-10 business days.
Okay, that sounds easy enough. What about the original shipping costs? Do I get those back too?
Yes, since you are returning the item within our return policy window of 90 days, we will also refund the original shipping costs. You'll see that reflected in your refund confirmation email.
Great! That's a relief. So, I just wait for the email with the label?

Exactly. You should receive the email with the prepaid shipping label within the next few minutes. Please let us know if you don't see it within an hour, and we can resend it. Regarding the VeloBand Pulse itself, do you have any other concerns or issues before we proceed with the return?
No, I think that's all. Thanks for your help. I was expecting a bigger hassle, to be honest.
You're very welcome. We strive to make the return process as smooth as possible for our customers. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
You're welcome! Have a great day and thank you for choosing VeloFit!
